story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_0100_10: Oh! Strong as usual. That makes my heart dance!
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Our next opponent is one of the legendary
dragons of Unova?
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It is my intention to test them—to take them to the
limits of their strength. Kiai!
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_1000_10: I can respect you and your beliefs.
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_1100_10:
However, there is nothing as empty as words not
backed up by strength.
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Go on and show that strength as proof
of your convictions once again.
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_1300_10: I can’t believe it’s come to this!
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Battling in extreme conditions like this makes me
stronger!
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_1800_10: I hope you didn’t think I’d be the same as before.
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Sableye became my partner Pokémon here on
Pasio...
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_2100_10: It’s your first time meeting, isn’t it?
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Time to let my feelings loose—so that we can
claim our victory!
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_2500_10:
My Pokémon believe in me, so I can’t give
up now!
story_arceus_03_08000/2401_1001_2700_10:
No—you were even more elegant and excellent
than before!
